items.text: opens the face of the bat and guides it to third man
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: shorted and wider outside off, he rocks back and slaps it towards point. Not much turn for Dilruwan at all
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: gets a better line and length, he comes onto the front foot and works it to fine leg
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: flatter outside off and skids through. He misses the attempted cut
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText:
Dasun Shanaka in. Over the wicket

Sagar: "If UAE and Nepal were given opportunity making it Eight countries tournament with 4 countries in each group.it would have been better tournament.Associates of asia would get good platform to develop themself as they are not getting chance to play in world cup." - True. But this format almost guarantees two India-Pakistan matches, and a possible third in the final. Decisions, decisions...
items.text: length ball on off, defended into the off-side
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: goes a bit down the leg, allowing Mushfiqur to tuck him away to square leg
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full and on the stumps, he comes on the front foot to drive down to long-on
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: strays down leg again and is tucked to square leg once again
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.preText: STAT ALERT This is now the highest third-wicket stand for Bangladesh after being two-down for under 10 runs
items.text: he's straying down leg a lot and the batsmen are happy to just keep flicking him down to square leg and fine leg for singles. This one brings up Mushfiqur's fifty too.
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: gets his line right that time, length ball on off. He opens the face of the bat to steer it to third man.
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: eddie: "This is the Asia Cup, not India-Pakistan cup. Should have more focus on getting in as many Asian countries playing as possible, not just making it so that IND and PAK can play each other as many times as possible."
items.text: spots the batsman coming down and fires it into his pads. He adjusts to clip it to square leg
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: Akshay: "Not the first time we have seen Mushi pull off a rescue act for Bangladesh.. He seems to find these capable partners at other end during his acts, some days it's Mahmudullah, today it's M. Mithun. "
items.text: short outside off and there's room for the batsman to stay low and cut it towards the point fence. With not much turn on the pitch, that's asking to be hit for runs
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up on middle and he comes on the front foot to work it away to midwicket
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: fuller and on the stumps, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: reverse paddle Only gets a top edge which falls safely, fortunately for the batsman, in the point region
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: worked to the left of midwicket
items.shortText: MDK Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Lots of people still asking about Tamim. He's gone for a scan to the hospital. we'll have more for you as soon as we now more
items.text: pitched up and driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: scoop over the wicketkeeper! Mushfiqur moved right across his stumps, got low and lifted it over the keeper's head. Talk about cheek...and confidence
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: direct hit Batsman's safe. The ball was pitched up and driven back past the bowler. Mid-off effected a direct hit but he was home
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full toss on the pads and flicked towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: Keeper standing up to the stumps
items.text: strays down leg and they'll clip that all day long. square leg comes around to mop it up on the boundary
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: angling back into the batsman, length ball on off. Defended back
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Aponso is back. Round the stumps Rayhanul Islam: "43 degrees C is very hot. The umpires should be very lenient towards the players. Just earlier this summer, someone died in the US during a cricket game from dehydration and heatstroke because the umpire did not allow enough drinks breaks." - And there's a drinks break right now. The conditions are sapping.
items.text: Take that! in the slot and effortlessly swatted back down the ground for a four. Stand and deliver
items.shortText: Aponso to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: goes a bit wider and fires it into the right-hander. Defended to cover
items.shortText: Aponso to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: goes down on one knee to sweep and makes decent connection, but there's a fielder at square leg. Mithun wanted two, but Mushfiqur sent him back, rightly
items.shortText: Aponso to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run
